name: learningexpress
description: node -v //to check node present npm init -y //setup basic json package npm i express //install express library npm i --save-dev nodemon //restarting server on change //edit "scripts": { "devStart": "nodemon server.js" } //starts server

scripts.devStart: nodemon -e js,ejs,html -w . -w public -w views -w routes -w models server.js
